title: Creating a JSO-compliant solver
short: A thorough guide for developers, from 0 to benchmarking.

title: How to solve an optimization problem with Ipopt and NLPModels
short: Quick guide to help you write your problem and solve it using Ipopt

title: How to create a model from the objective function and its derivatives
short: Write a simple model with total control over its derivatives.

title: Solve a PDE-constrained optimization problem
short: Solve a discretized PDE-constrained optimization problem using DCISolver and Ipopt.

title: Introduction to CUTEst
short: CUTEst.jl was the first package in the JSO ecosystem. It is an essential part of the nonlinear optimization academic research landscape.

title: Introduction to BenchmarkProfiles
short: This is a simple package to plot mathematical performance and data profiles, as defined by Elizabeth Dolan, Jorge Mor√© and Stefan Wild

title: Introduction to RipQP
short: A package to optimize linear and quadratic problems in QuadraticModel format using a regularized interior-point method.

title: Introduction to ADNLPModels
short: ADNLPModel is simple to use and is useful for classrooms.

title: Introduction to NLPModelsJuMP
short: NLPModelsJuMP is a combination of NLPModels and JuMP.

title: Introduction to OptimizationProblems
short: OptimizationProblems is a collection of problems in JuMP and ADNLPModel format.

title: Introduction to NLPModelsIpopt
short: NLPModelsIpopt is a thin IPOPT wrapper for NLPModels.

title: Introduction to CaNNOLeS
short: CaNNOLeS is a solver for equality-constrained nonlinear least-squares problems.

title: Test allocations of NLPModels
short: NLPModelsTest has a new feature to check allocations of NLPModels.

title: Using callbacks
short: Here is a short tutorial on using callbacks with our solvers.

title: Introduction to BundleAdjustmentModels
short: A Julia repository of bundle adjustment problems from the Bundle Adjustment in the Large repository.
